NAME
 start-here-2 - another very simple example for txt2man
SYNOPSIS
 start-here-2 [-hnv] [-f configfile] file
DESCRIPTION
 start-here-2 is used to demonstrate another very
 simple example of a manpage to be created by txt2man program.

 The main intent is use a syntax different from start-here to
 produce the same result as manpage. Please, compare both txt
 files (start-here.txt and start-here-2.txt).
OPTIONS
 -h  Show help message and exit.
 -n  Do anything.
 -v  Verbose mode.
 -f configfile  Use an alternative config file.
SEE ALSO
 start-here(1)
AUTHOR
 start-here was written by John Jr <jjr@example.com>.

 This manual page was written by Joao Eriberto Mota Filho <eriberto@debian.org>
 for the Debian project (but may be used by others).
